## R Figure Example

The following code generates the plot on the next slide:

```{r pressureCode, eval=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = as.factor(cyl), y = mpg)) + 
    geom_boxplot(fill = "#A4C8E1") + 
    labs(x = "Number of cylinders", 
         y = 'Miles/(US) gallon')

```  


## R Figure Example
